Description_lang: Engulfs an enemy target in flame, dealing $s1 Fire damage every $t1 sec. Every time Fiery Combustion deals damage, it generates a Mark of Combustion charge on the target. When Combustion fades or is dispelled, it unleashes a patch of fire proportional in size to the number of charges present at the time. Either curse or magic removal may cleanse this affliction.
AuraDescription_lang: Causes $s1 Fire damage and generates a Combustion charge every $t1 sec.When removed, causes an explosion proportional to the number of charges present.
